name: Family-Friendly Community Programming
description: Navigating life in a new country requires a concerted family effort. RIT’s family engagement activities connect families to essential resources and decrease social isolation. - Quarterly community events - Workshops: TOPICS - health and wellness, positive parenting, healthy nutrition, the U.S. citizenship application process, knowing your rights, and managing your finances - Support Groups: held in native languages - Field Trips: samples; SF Academy of Sciences, Disney on Ice, the Exploratorium,
